titleStmt.title: The compleat troller, or, The art of trolling with a description of all the utensils, instruments, tackling, and materials requisite thereto, with rules and directions how to use them : as also a brief account of most of the principal rivers in England / by a lover of the sport.
titleStmt.author: Nobbes, Robert, 1652-1706?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. James for Tho. Helder ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
